translation: Always glorifying Me, striving, firm in their vows, prostrating themselves before Me, they worship Me with steadfast devotion.
commentary: 9.14 constantly always? chanting glorifying? Mam Me? Striving trying? f and? firm in vows? prostrating while bowing? f and? Mam Me? bhaktya with devotion? always steadfast? worship worship.Commentary These great souls sing My glory. They do Japa (repetition) of Pranava (Om). They study and recite the Upanishads. Do they hear the Srutis (the Vedas) from their spiritual preceptor? reflect
